channel.title: Tiny Taverns: anyone playing?
channel.description: Has anyone here played Tiny Taverns? It looks very cute. I’ve not played anything in the Tiny Dungeon line, but this one looked very interesting to me so I backed it. It’s a fun read and seems to be easy to get to the fun quickly.

item.title: Tiny Taverns: anyone playing?
item.dc:creator: @Stephen
item.description:
@Stephen wrote:

Has anyone here played Tiny Taverns? It looks very cute. I’ve not played anything in the Tiny Dungeon line, but this one looked very interesting to me so I backed it.
It’s a fun read and seems to be easy to get to the fun quickly.
